3. Eastern hognose snakes and Sonoran coral snakes use a tactic called cloacal popping to scare off predators.

5. Bolson pupfish can die if they don't fart out gas produced by algae in their digestive systems.
6. Cows are ruminants with four-chambered stomachs, which produce a lot of gas, including methane, a major greenhouse gas.

4. Animal farts can have significant impacts on their environment and other animals.
